mapper.select: SELECT tam.ACCOUNT_ID accountId, tam.USER_NAME userName, tam.LOGIN_EMAIL loginEmail, tam.LOGIN_PW loginPw, tam.USER_ROLE userRole FROM tb_account_main tam WHERE tam.LOGIN_EMAIL = #{loginEmail};
SELECT tam.ACCOUNT_ID accountId, tam.USER_NAME userName, tam.LOGIN_EMAIL loginEmail, tam.LOGIN_PW loginPw, tam.USER_ROLE userRole FROM tb_account_main tam WHERE tam.ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId};
SELECT COUNT(tam.ACCOUNT_ID) FROM tb_account_main tam WHERE tam.LOGIN_EMAIL = #{loginEmail};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_account_main( USER_NAME, LOGIN_EMAIL, LOGIN_PW, NICK_NAME, PHONE_NUM, GENDER ) VALUE ( #{account.userName}, #{account.loginEmail}, #{account.loginPw}, #{account.nickName}, #{account.phoneNum}, #{account.gender} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_account_main SET LOGIN_PW = #{account.loginPw}, WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId};
UPDATE tb_account_main SET NICK_NAME = #{account.nickName}, WHERE ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId};
